WorkItem.Description:
Implement method to auto detect Mode for input string.

Implement Nunit test for Auto-detect method.

Comments.Message:
Check-in 7704
Implemented Auto-Detect mode method. 

User could use that method now to get proper mode and encoding string for their input string. Only problem is that currently ZXing wrapper's ECI table has error. Only default iso-8859-1 and shift_jis can output correct ECI header.

Associated with check-in 10244 
Improve speed of input recognition method.
